The Latest Item Fried Cheese Grits

Crispy fried cheese topped with crawfish etouffee. If this is how people in New Orleans eat on a daily basis, then this is the only excuse I need to visit.

The Place Angeline’s Louisiana Kitchen $$

2261 Shattuck Ave
Berkeley, CA 94704
